test_questions.question: What is the fundamental difference between digitization and digitalization in business context?

options.A: Digitization is about converting data, digitalization transforms entire business models
options.C: Digitization uses computers, digitalization uses smartphones
options.D: Digitization is free, digitalization requires investment

options.A: Creating a company website with contact information

options.C: Purchasing the latest computers for all employees
options.D: Increasing social media presence for marketing purposes
